entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -28.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 3:43 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -28.7°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -33.7°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
